summary: "Bad Boys: Ride or Die" is an action-packed comedy movie that came out in 2024. It stars Will Smith and Martin Lawrence as Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett. They try to clear the name of their late captain, who was wrongly accused of a crime. The film is the fourth in the Bad Boys series and was directed by Adil & Bilall. Despite some production delays, it was a big hit, making over $400 million worldwide.
title: Bad Boys Ride or Die
